comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: Unfortunately quite a lot of pictures of the Siemens Schuckert Werke [abbreviated S.S.W.] have been misspelled as Siemens-Shuckert Werke in the heading and as a Manufacturer name and a Tags, making them probably difficult to find.
